title: Can you take homeopathic remedies during intermittent fasting?
description: Answer (1 of 6): Preemptively, homeopathic remedies do nothing, so don't take them. The homeopathic remedy doesn't have honey or some sweetener in it you can take it (aka, just water) during your fast. During your eating time you can eat anything.
